title: Broken game
body: Wouldn't let me connect to two game cause "internet problem" so i lose 40 lp. So i restarted my pc and tried again now my client crash making me lose more lp with a 28 min wait time. fun game

replies.body: It sucks to get that lower priority queue, and the high time only happens after consistently leaving.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot whatever is causing your network to lose comms with the game server.  You should also test it in a custom game to prevent anymore penalties.  I hope that helps!
